comments.comments_text: The ball rebounds and arrives at the feet of Pablo Sarabia (Paris SG) just outside the box. He doesn't think twice and fires a brilliant shot inside the right post. His attempt was beyond the reach of Matis Carvalho, so the score changes to 1:0.

comments.comments_text: Angel Di Maria sends a superb cross into the box. Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) latches on to it and from close range plants a header into the bottom right corner, leaving Matis Carvalho beaten. He displayed his eye for goal there - excellent finish. The score is 6:0.
